name: .SLDDRT
summary: Learn about .SLDDRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an SLDDRT file in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks. To do so:
Place the file in SolidWorks' sheetformat directory.
When the Sheet Format/Size window appears, select the format your SLDDRT file contains.
SolidWorks will then create a new drawing using your SLDDRT file's formatting.
To create or edit an SLDDRT file:
Create a new SolidWorks drawing and open an existing sheet format.
Select Edit Sheet Format and edit the sheet's formatting as needed.
Select File â†’ Save Sheet Format....
Name and save your SLDDRT file.

images.caption: SLDDRT file open in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks Premium 2022
